mapper.select: select id from rooms where id not in (select room_id from choose_rooms where reservation_id in (select id from reservations where to_date(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between start_date and end_date and canceled = 0)) and hotel_id = #{hotelId} and grade = #{roomGrade}

SELECT r.start_date,rm.grade,r.end_date,rm.room_image,rm.intro,cr.now_price FROM(SELECT * FROM RESERVATIONS WHERE id = #{id}) r inner JOIN CHOOSE_ROOMS cr ON r.id = cr.reservation_id inner JOIN ROOMS rm ON cr.room_id = rm.id
